title: Music
main_text:
I spread the message of hope and of unity. That's what gets me up in the morning. I can tell you what is wrong. But I cant tell you how to fix it. I am a raptivist, not a politician I deal in hope. Chuck D

I Hear America Singing by Walt Whitman

The Red Lacquer Music-Stand by Amy Lowell

A Red, Red Rose by Robert Burns
